forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning then remaining overcast for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning. Remaining cloudy this afternoon. High 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
